name: Dinner Tonight: Creamy Broccoli Soup
description: [Photograph: Blake Royer] If cream of broccoli soup has a bad reputation for you—as it does for me, conjuring up a picture of thick sludge—then this might be the soup for you. I pulled it from Mark Bittman's How to...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound broccoli, stems chopped and florets broken up

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion, broccoli, garlic, and a pinch of salt and pepper, and saute until the onion is soft, about 10 minutes. Add the white wine and cook for an additional minute, then add the stock. Simmer until the broccoli is very tender, 10 to 12 minutes more.
Purée the soup using a stick or regular blender, or let it cool somewhat and pass it through a food mill.
Stir in the sour cream, season to taste, and serve.
